fields.name: Copy_1_of_DocumentsWIthoutFileMessage
fields.fieldText: Please ensure the declarations below are answered before submitting

fields.name: DocumentsWIthoutFileMessage
fields.fieldText: Please ensure the documents below have files attached to them, they are required before you can submit this application

fields.name: DoNotCloseThePageMessage
fields.fieldText:
Do Not Close The Page!

Please ensure you click the "Next" button once the green check mark appears, failure to do so may result in your application being processed inaccurately.

fields.name: PleaseWaitForNSCPMessage
fields.fieldText: This application has already been submitted and will be reviewed by the NSCP. You can expect to receive a response shortly.

fields.name: PaymentUnsuccessfulMessage
fields.fieldText: Sorry your payment was unsuccessful, please try again
